short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get weather report no matter wherever you are in the world.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
My Weather Tab has been built in mind to provide clean and simple tab experience so you can just open a new browser tab and see your current location weather information as well as allowing you to quickly find and view search results directly from your new tab.

By Clicking ‘Add to Chrome’, you are accepting and agreeing to install the My Weather Tab extension, and understand that your browsers new tab will be changed to that provided by the service with search results by Microsoft Bing. Your usage of this extension will be governed by the Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions links below.

Links:
https://iskra.com.au/privacy-policy/
https://iskra.com.au/terms-conditions/
